requirements.summary: Create a Ramadan Prayer Timings screen displaying the five daily prayer times for all 30 days of Ramadan with static data, using the existing Islamic green and gold theme
acceptanceCriteria: A dedicated Ramadan Prayer Timings page/screen is accessible from the Home screen navigation cards
The screen lists prayer times (Suhoor, Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib/Iftar, Isha) for all 30 days of Ramadan
Each prayer entry displays both the Arabic name and English name
The screen uses the existing Islamic green and gold visual theme consistent with the rest of the app
The Ramadan Prayer Timings navigation card or link is added to the Home screen
The screen is mobile-first with smooth scrolling

file_operations.description: Create the Ramadan Prayer Timings page component that displays a list of all 30 days of Ramadan with static prayer times (Suhoor/Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib/Iftar, Isha). Each day entry shows the day number, date reference, and prayer times with both Arabic and English names. Use Card components from shadcn/ui for each day entry. Apply the existing Islamic green and gold theme using Tailwind utility classes and custom theme tokens from tailwind.config.js. Ensure the layout is mobile-first with smooth scrolling.

requirements.summary: Wire the Ramadan Prayer Timings page into the app by adding a route in App.tsx and a navigation card on the Home screen
acceptanceCriteria: A new route (e.g., /prayer-timings) is registered in App.tsx
The Home screen displays a navigation card for Ramadan Prayer Timings alongside the existing Surah List, Juz Index, Tasbeeh, and Settings cards
Tapping the card navigates to the Ramadan Prayer Timings screen

file_operations.description: Add a new route for /prayer-timings in the TanStack Router configuration that renders the PrayerTimings page component. Import the PrayerTimings component and register it alongside existing routes (home, surah-list, surah-reader, juz-index, settings, tasbeeh).

Add a navigation card for 'Ramadan Prayer Timings' to the Home page alongside the existing Surah List, Juz Index, Tasbeeh, and Settings cards. The card should use the Link component from TanStack Router to navigate to /prayer-timings. Style the card consistently with existing navigation cards using the Islamic green and gold theme. Include an appropriate icon (e.g., calendar or clock icon) and label text in both English and optionally Arabic.
